PLAY.TITLE: The Third Part of Henry the Sixth

PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae
PERSONAE.PERSONA: EDWARD, PRINCE OF WALES, his son.
KING LEWIS XI, King of France.

PGROUP.PERSONA: EDWARD, Earl of March, afterwards King Edward IV.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: uncles to the Duke of York.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: HENRY, Earl of Richmond, a youth.
LORD RIVERS, brother to Lady Grey.
A Son that has killed his father.
A Father that has killed his son.
LADY GREY, afterwards Queen to Edward IV.
BONA, sister to the French Queen.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. The Parliament-house.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum. Enter YORK, EDWARD, RICHARD, NORFOLK, MONTAGUE, WARWICK, and Soldiers

Flourish. Enter KING HENRY VI, CLIFFORD,
NORTHUMBERLAND, WESTMORELAND, EXETER, and the rest

He stamps with his foot and the soldiers show
themselves

Exeunt YORK, EDWARD, EDMUND, GEORGE, RICHARD,
WARWICK, NORFOLK, MONTAGUE, their Soldiers, and
Attendants
Enter QUEEN MARGARET and PRINCE EDWARD
Exeunt QUEEN MARGARET and PRINCE EDWARD

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Sandal Castle.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: MONTAGUE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Enter JOHN MORTIMER and HUGH MORTIMER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Field of battle betwixt Sandal Castle and Wakefield.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarums. Enter RUTLAND and his Tutor

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Another part of the field.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: YORK
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Enter QUEEN MARGARET, CLIFFORD, NORTHUMBERLAND,
PRINCE EDWARD, and Soldiers

SCENE.STAGEDIR: They lay hands on YORK, who struggles

SPEECH.SPEAKER: QUEEN MARGARET
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Putting a paper crown on his head

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A plain near Mortimer's Cross in Herefordshire.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: A march. Enter EDWARD, RICHARD, and their power
March. Enter WARWICK, MONTAGUE, and their army

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. Before York.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING HENRY VI, QUEEN MARGARET,
PRINCE EDWARD, CLIFFORD, and NORTHUMBERLAND, with
drum and trumpets

March. Enter EDWARD, GEORGE, RICHARD, WARWICK,
NORFOLK, MONTAGUE, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. A field of battle between Towton and Saxton, in Yorkshire.
SCENE IV. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: They fight. WARWICK comes; CLIFFORD flies

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Alarum. Enter KING HENRY VI alone

Alarum. Enter a Son that has killed his father,
dragging in the dead body
Enter a Father that has killed his son, bringing in the body

Alarums: excursions. Enter QUEEN MARGARET, PRINCE
EDWARD, and EXETER

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: A loud alarum. Enter CLIFFORD, wounded

Alarum and retreat. Enter EDWARD, GEORGE, RICHARD,
MONTAGUE, WARWICK, and Soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. A forest in the north of England.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter two Keepers, with cross-bows in their hands
Enter KING HENRY VI, disguised, with a prayerbook

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, and
LADY GREY

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. France. KING LEWIS XI's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING LEWIS XI, his sister BONA,
his Admiral, called BOURBON, PRINCE EDWARD, QUEEN
MARGARET, and OXFORD. KING LEWIS XI sits, and
riseth up again
He gives his hand to WARWICK

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, SOMERSET, and MONTAGUE

Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, attended; QUEEN
ELIZABETH, PEMBROKE, STAFFORD, HASTINGS, and others

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A plain in Warwickshire.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter WARWICK and OXFORD, with French soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Edward's camp, near Warwick.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter three Watchmen, to guard KING EDWARD IV's tent

Enter WARWICK, CLARENCE, OXFORD, SOMERSET, and
French soldiers, silent all

WARWICK and the rest cry all, 'Warwick! Warwick!'
and set upon the Guard, who fly, crying, 'Arm!
arm!' WARWICK and the rest following them

The drum playing and trumpet sounding, reenter
WARWICK, SOMERSET, and the rest, bringing KING
EDWARD IV out in his gown, sitting in a chair.
RICHARD and HASTINGS fly over the stage

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. London. The palace.
SCENE V. A park near Middleham Castle In Yorkshire.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter KING EDWARD IV and a Huntsman with him

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. London. The Tower.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING HENRY VI, CLARENCE, WARWICK,
SOMERSET, HENRY OF RICHMOND, OXFORD, MONTAGUE, and
Lieutenant of the Tower

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING HENRY VI
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Lays his hand on his head

SCENE.STAGEDIR: Exeunt all but SOMERSET, HENRY OF RICHMOND, and OXFORD

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. Before York.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER,
HASTINGS, and Soldiers
Enter, on the walls, the Mayor of York, and his Brethren
Enter the Mayor and two Aldermen, below
March. Enter MONTGOMERY, with drum and soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VIII. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING HENRY VI, WARWICK, MONTAGUE,
CLARENCE, EXETER, and OXFORD
Exeunt all but KING HENRY VI and EXETER
Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER, and soldiers

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING EDWARD IV
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Exeunt some with KING HENRY VI

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Coventry.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter WARWICK, the Mayor of Coventry, two Messengers,
and others upon the walls

March: flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER,
and soldiers
Enter OXFORD, with drum and colours
He and his forces enter the city
Enter MONTAGUE with drum and colours
He and his forces enter the city
Enter SOMERSET, with drum and colours
He and his forces enter the city
Enter CLARENCE, with drum and colours

SPEECH.SPEAKER: CLARENCE
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Taking his red rose out of his hat

SPEECH.SPEAKER: KING EDWARD IV
SPEECH.STAGEDIR:
Exeunt King Edward and his company. March. Warwick
and his company follow

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE II. A field of battle near Barnet.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Alarum and excursions. Enter KING EDWARD IV, bringing
forth WARWICK wounded

SPEECH.SPEAKER: OXFORD
SPEECH.STAGEDIR: Here they bear away his body. Exeunt

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE III. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV in triumph; with
GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE, and the rest

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE IV. Plains near Tewksbury.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
March. Enter QUEEN MARGARET, PRINCE EDWARD,
SOMERSET, OXFORD, and soldiers

Flourish and march. Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER,
CLARENCE, and soldiers

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE V. Another part of the field.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, GLOUCESTER, CLARENCE,
and soldiers; with QUEEN MARGARET, OXFORD, and
SOMERSET, prisoners

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VI. London. The Tower.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Enter KING HENRY VI and GLOUCESTER, with the
Lieutenant, on the walls

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE VII. London. The palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR:
Flourish. Enter KING EDWARD IV, QUEEN ELIZABETH,
CLARENCE, GLOUCESTER, HASTINGS, a Nurse with the
young Prince, and Attendants
